Class FCTPperfm

  • java.lang.Object
    • FCTPperfm
  • public class FCTPperfm
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for keeping track of some statistics for measuring performance of the applied heuristic methods for solving the FCTP.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description
      FCTPperfm()
      Constructor for objects of class FCTPperfm

      void displayPerformance​(boolean initialSol)
      Print information about the performance reached by a heuristic
      void resetStats()
      Reset the statistics for performance measurement

      Update performance statistics (iterations, objective values)

    • Method Detail

      • resetStats

        public void resetStats()
        Reset the statistics for performance measurement

      • updateStats

        public void updateStats​(int numIter,
                        double curObj)
        Update performance statistics (iterations, objective values)
        Parameters:
        numIter - is number of iterations performed in last run of the heuristic procedure
        curObj - objective value of the solution obtained in the procedure's last run

      • displayPerformance

        public void displayPerformance​(boolean initialSol)
        Print information about the performance reached by a heuristic
        Parameters:
        intialSol - need to be true initial solution is to be reported
